        <td id="LC1536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">same thing, the pure giving of gifts?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1537"></td>
        <td id="LC1537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1538"></td>
        <td id="LC1538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(Note: The &quot;Salon Apocalypse&quot; was organized by Sharon Gannon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1539"></td>
        <td id="LC1539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in July, 1986.)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1540"></td>
        <td id="LC1540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1541"></td>
        <td id="LC1541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">II. Murder--War--Famine--Greed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1542"></td>
        <td id="LC1542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1543"></td>
        <td id="LC1543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THE MANICHEES &amp; CATHARS believed that the body can be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1544"></td>
        <td id="LC1544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spiritualized--or rather, that the body merely contaminates</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1545"></td>
        <td id="LC1545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pure spirit &amp; must be utterly rejected. The Gnostic</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1546"></td>
        <td id="LC1546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_perfecti_ (radical dualists) starved themselves to death to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1547"></td>
        <td id="LC1547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">escape the body &amp; return to the pleroma of pure light.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1548"></td>
        <td id="LC1548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So: to evade the evils of the flesh--murder, war, famine,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1549"></td>
        <td id="LC1549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greed--paradoxically only one path remains: murder of one&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1550"></td>
        <td id="LC1550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own body, war on the flesh, famine unto death, greed for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1551"></td>
        <td id="LC1551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">salvation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1552"></td>
        <td id="LC1552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The radical monists however (Ismailis, Ranters, Antinomians)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1553"></td>
        <td id="LC1553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consider that body &amp; spirit are one, that the same spirit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1554"></td>
        <td id="LC1554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which pervades a black stone also infuses the flesh with its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1555"></td>
        <td id="LC1555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">light; that all lives &amp; all is life. &quot;Things are what they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1556"></td>
        <td id="LC1556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are spontaneously...everything is natural...all in motion as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1557"></td>
        <td id="LC1557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if there were a True Lord to move them--but if we seek for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1558"></td>
        <td id="LC1558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evidence of this lord we fail to find any.&quot; (Kuo Hsiang)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1559"></td>
        <td id="LC1559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1560"></td>
        <td id="LC1560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Paradoxically, the monist path also cannot be followed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1561"></td>
        <td id="LC1561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without some sort of &quot;murder, war, famine, greed&quot;: the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1562"></td>
        <td id="LC1562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">transformation of death into life (food, negentropy)--war</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1563"></td>
        <td id="LC1563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against the Empire of Lies--&quot;fasting of the soul,&quot; or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1564"></td>
        <td id="LC1564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">renunciation of the Lie, of all that is not life--&amp; greed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1565"></td>
        <td id="LC1565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for life itself, the absolute power of desire.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1566"></td>
        <td id="LC1566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1567"></td>
        <td id="LC1567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Even more: without knowledge of the darkness (&quot;carnal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1568"></td>
        <td id="LC1568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knowledge&quot;) there can exist no knowledge of the light</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1569"></td>
        <td id="LC1569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(&quot;gnosis&quot;). The two knowledges are not merely complementary:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1570"></td>
        <td id="LC1570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">say rather _identical_, like the same note played in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1571"></td>
        <td id="LC1571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">different octaves. Heraclitus claims that reality persists</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1572"></td>
        <td id="LC1572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a state of &quot;war.&quot; Only clashing notes can make harmony.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1573"></td>
        <td id="LC1573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(&quot;Chaos is the sum of all orders.&quot;)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1574"></td>
        <td id="LC1574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Give each of these four terms a different mask of language</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1575"></td>
        <td id="LC1575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(to call the Furies &quot;The Kindly Ones&quot; is not mere euphemism</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1576"></td>
        <td id="LC1576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but a way of uncovering _yet_more_meaning_). Masked,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1577"></td>
        <td id="LC1577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ritualized, realized as art, the terms take on their dark</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1578"></td>
        <td id="LC1578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beauty, their &quot;Black Light.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1579"></td>
        <td id="LC1579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1580"></td>
        <td id="LC1580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Instead of murder say _the_hunt_, the pure paleolithic</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1581"></td>
        <td id="LC1581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">economy of all archaic and non-authoritarian tribal society-</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1582"></td>
        <td id="LC1582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">-&quot;venery,&quot; both the killing &amp; eating of flesh &amp; the way of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1583"></td>
        <td id="LC1583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Venus, of desire. Instead of war say _insurrection_, not the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1584"></td>
        <td id="LC1584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">revolution of classes &amp; powers but of the eternal rebel, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1585"></td>
        <td id="LC1585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dark one who uncovers light. Instead of greed say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1586"></td>
        <td id="LC1586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_yearning_, unconquerable desire, mad love. And then instead</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1587"></td>
        <td id="LC1587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of famine, which is a kind of mutilation, speak of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1588"></td>
        <td id="LC1588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wholeness, plenty, superabundance, generosity of the self</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1589"></td>
        <td id="LC1589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which spirals outward toward the Other.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1590"></td>
        <td id="LC1590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1591"></td>
        <td id="LC1591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Without this dance of masks, nothing will be created. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1592"></td>
        <td id="LC1592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">oldest mythology makes Eros the firstborn of Chaos. Eros,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1593"></td>
        <td id="LC1593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the wild one who tames, is the door through which the artist</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1594"></td>
        <td id="LC1594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">returns to Chaos, the One, and then re-returns, comes back</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1595"></td>
        <td id="LC1595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again, bearing one of the patterns of beauty. The artist,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1596"></td>
        <td id="LC1596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the hunter, the warrior: one who is both passionate and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1597"></td>
        <td id="LC1597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">balanced, both greedy &amp; altruistic to the utmost extreme. We</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1598"></td>
        <td id="LC1598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must be saved from all salvations which save us from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1599"></td>
        <td id="LC1599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ourselves, from our _animal_ which is also our _anima_, our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1600"></td>
        <td id="LC1600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very lifeforce, as well as our _animus_, our animating self-</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1601"></td>
        <td id="LC1601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">empowerment, which may even manifest as anger &amp; greed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1602"></td>
        <td id="LC1602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">BABYLON has told us that our flesh is filth--with this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1603"></td>
        <td id="LC1603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">device &amp; the promise of salvation it enslaved us. But--if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1604"></td>
        <td id="LC1604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the flesh is already &quot;saved,&quot; already _light_--if even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1605"></td>
        <td id="LC1605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consciousness itself is a kind of flesh, a palpable &amp;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1606"></td>
        <td id="LC1606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">simultaneous living aether--then we need no power to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1607"></td>
        <td id="LC1607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intercede for us. The wilderness, as Omar says, is paradise</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1608"></td>
        <td id="LC1608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_even_now_.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1609"></td>
        <td id="LC1609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1610"></td>
        <td id="LC1610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The true proprietorship of _murder_ lies with the Empire,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1611"></td>
        <td id="LC1611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for only freedom is complete life. _War_ is Babylonian as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1612"></td>
        <td id="LC1612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well--no free person will die for another&#39;s aggrandizement.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1613"></td>
        <td id="LC1613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Famine_ comes into existence _only_ with the civilization</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1614"></td>
        <td id="LC1614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the saviors, the priest-kings--wasn&#39;t it Joseph who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1615"></td>
        <td id="LC1615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">taught Pharaoh to speculate in grain futures? _Greed_--for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1616"></td>
        <td id="LC1616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">land, for symbolic wealth, for power to deform others&#39; souls</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1617"></td>
        <td id="LC1617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&amp; bodies for their own _salvation_--greed too arises not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1618"></td>
        <td id="LC1618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from &quot;Nature nature-ing,&quot; but from the damming up &amp;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1619"></td>
        <td id="LC1619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">canalization of all energies for the Empire&#39;s Glory.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1620"></td>
        <td id="LC1620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Against all this, the artist possesses the dance of masks,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1621"></td>
        <td id="LC1621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the total radicalization of language, the invention of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1622"></td>
        <td id="LC1622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Poetic Terrorism&quot; which will strike not at living beings</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1623"></td>
        <td id="LC1623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but at malign _ideas_, dead-weights on the coffin-lid of our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1624"></td>
        <td id="LC1624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">desires. The architecture of suffocation and paralysis will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1625"></td>
        <td id="LC1625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be _blown_up_ only by our total celebration of everything--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1626"></td>
        <td id="LC1626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even darkness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1627"></td>
        <td id="LC1627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1628"></td>
        <td id="LC1628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">--Summer Solstice, 1986</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1629"></td>

        <td id="L2563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2563"></td>
        <td id="LC2563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Classical 19th century anarchism defined itself in the</td>

        <td id="LC3675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THE SEA-ROVERS AND CORSAIRS of the 18th century created an</td>

        <td id="L3677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3677"></td>

        <td id="L3678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3678"></td>

        <td id="L3754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3754"></td>

        <td id="L3755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3755"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3760"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3762"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3763"></td>
        <td id="LC3763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the wheel, the return of history again and again to its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3764"></td>
        <td id="LC3764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">highest form: jackboot on the face of humanity forever.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3765"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3858"></td>
        <td id="LC3858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3859"></td>
        <td id="LC3859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In sum, realism demands not only that we give up _waiting_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3860"></td>
        <td id="LC3860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for &quot;the Revolution&quot; but also that we give up _wanting_ it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3861"></td>
        <td id="LC3861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Uprising,&quot; yes--as often as possible and even at the risk</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3862"></td>
        <td id="LC3862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of violence. The _spasming_ of the Simulated State will be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3863"></td>
        <td id="LC3863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;spectacular,&quot; but in most cases the best and most radical</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3864"></td>
        <td id="LC3864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tactic will be to refuse to engage in spectacular violence,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3865"></td>
        <td id="LC3865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to _withdraw_ from the area of simulation, to disappear.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3866"></td>
        <td id="LC3866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3867"></td>
        <td id="LC3867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The TAZ is an encampment of guerilla ontologists: strike and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3868"></td>
        <td id="LC3868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">run away. Keep moving the entire tribe, even if it&#39;s only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3869"></td>
        <td id="LC3869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">data in the Web. The TAZ must be capable of defense; but</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L3871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3871"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3874"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3877"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="L3897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3897"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3940"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3946"></td>
        <td id="LC3946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">1. First, we can speak of a natural anthropology of the TAZ.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3947"></td>
        <td id="LC3947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The nuclear family is the base unit of consensus society,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3948"></td>
        <td id="LC3948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but not of the TAZ. (&quot;Families!--how I hate them! the misers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3949"></td>
        <td id="LC3949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of love!&quot;--Gide) The nuclear family, with its attendant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3950"></td>
        <td id="LC3950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;oedipal miseries,&quot; appears to have been a Neolithic</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4781"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4843"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4853"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4872"></td>
        <td id="LC4872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up the entire activity of the government. Eighteen months</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5151"></td>
        <td id="LC5151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">real) the moments and spaces in which freedom is not only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5152"></td>
        <td id="LC5152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possible but _actual_. We must know in what ways we are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5153"></td>
        <td id="LC5153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">genuinely oppressed, and also in what ways we are self-</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5154"></td>
        <td id="LC5154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">repressed or ensnared in a fantasy in which _ideas_ oppress</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5155"></td>
        <td id="LC5155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us. WORK, for example, is a far more actual source of misery</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5156"></td>
        <td id="LC5156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for most of us than legislative politics. Alienation is far</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5157"></td>
        <td id="LC5157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more dangerous for us than toothless outdated dying</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5158"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5159"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5161"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5167"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5172"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5242"></td>
        <td id="LC5242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">NOT YET A SCIENCE but a proposition: That certain problems</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5243"></td>
        <td id="LC5243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in linguistics might be solved by viewing language as a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5244"></td>
        <td id="LC5244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">complex dynamical system or &quot;Chaos field.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5245"></td>
        <td id="LC5245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5246"></td>
        <td id="LC5246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of all the responses to Saussure&#39;s linguistics, two have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5247"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5248"></td>
        <td id="LC5248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">traced--in the modern period--from Rimbaud&#39;s departure for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5249"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5250"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5251"></td>
        <td id="LC5251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;the Map is not the Territory&quot;; to Burroughs&#39; cut-ups and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5252"></td>
        <td id="LC5252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;breakthrough in the Gray Room&quot;; to Zerzan&#39;s attack on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5253"></td>
        <td id="LC5253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">language itself as representation and mediation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5254"></td>
        <td id="LC5254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5255"></td>
        <td id="LC5255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The second, Chomskyan Linguistics, with its belief in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5256"></td>
        <td id="LC5256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;universal grammar&quot; and its tree diagrams, represents (I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5257"></td>
        <td id="LC5257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">believe) an attempt to &quot;save&quot; language by discovering</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5258"></td>
        <td id="LC5258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;hidden invariables,&quot; much in the same way certain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5259"></td>
        <td id="LC5259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scientists are trying to &quot;save&quot; physics from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5260"></td>
        <td id="LC5260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;irrationality&quot; of quantum mechanics. Although as an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5261"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC5262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nihilists, in fact his beautiful theory has more in common</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5264"></td>
        <td id="LC5264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">metaphysics describes language as pure light shining through</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5265"></td>
        <td id="LC5265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the colored glass of the archetypes; Chomsky speaks of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5266"></td>
        <td id="LC5266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;innate&quot; grammars. Words are leaves, branches are sentences,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5267"></td>
        <td id="LC5267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mother tongues are limbs, language families are trunks, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5268"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5269"></td>
        <td id="LC5269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;hermetalinguistics&quot;--hermetic and metaphysical. Nihilism</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5270"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5275"></td>

        <td id="L5286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5286"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5295"></td>

        <td id="L5301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5301"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5307"></td>
        <td id="LC5307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I find this theory more satisfyingly anarchistic than either</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5311"></td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5321"></td>
        <td id="LC5321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Appendix B. Applied Hedonics</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5322"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5323"></td>
        <td id="LC5323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THE BONNOT GANG WERE vegetarians and drank only water. They</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5324"></td>
        <td id="LC5324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came to a bad (tho&#39; picturesque) end. Vegetables and water,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5325"></td>
        <td id="LC5325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in themselves excellent things--pure zen really--shouldn&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5326"></td>
        <td id="LC5326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be consumed as martyrdom but as an epiphany. Self-denial as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5327"></td>
        <td id="LC5327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">radical praxis, the Leveller impulse, tastes of millenarian</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5328"></td>
        <td id="LC5328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gloom--and this current on the Left shares an historical</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5329"></td>
        <td id="LC5329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wellspring with the neo-puritan fundamentalism and moralic</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5330"></td>
        <td id="LC5330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reaction of our decade. The New Ascesis, whether practiced</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5331"></td>
        <td id="LC5331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by anorexic health-cranks, thin-lipped police sociologists,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5332"></td>
        <td id="LC5332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">downtown straight-edge nihilists, cornpone fascist baptists,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5333"></td>
        <td id="LC5333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">socialist torpedoes, drug-free Republicans...in every case</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5334"></td>
        <td id="LC5334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the motive force is the same: _resentment_.</td>
